name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emoji & GIF Finder - Search and Share Instantly

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick emoji and GIF search extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

🔍 Search Emojis Instantly: Just type a keyword (like "smile," "love," or "party") to find the ideal emoji in seconds.

🎥 Find Trending GIFs: Browse millions of GIFs in real time for every mood, occasion, or reaction.

📋 One-Click Copy: Quickly copy emojis or GIF URLs and paste them directly into Gmail, Slack, WhatsApp, or any platform you use.

⭐ Favorites: Save your go-to emojis and GIFs for super fast access anytime.

🕒 Recently Used: Easily revisit your most recent emojis and GIFs without searching again.

🎉 Works Everywhere: Perfect for emails, chats, social media posts, documents—anywhere you need a little extra flair!

How It Works:
1️⃣ Click the extension icon.
2️⃣ Type a keyword to search for emojis or switch to the GIF tab.
3️⃣ Copy or insert your chosen emoji or GIF with just one click!

Why You'll Love It:
💼 For Everyone: Whether you're adding a creative touch to work emails, leveling up your social media game, or sharing laughs with friends, this extension has your back.

💻 Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with Gmail, WhatsApp Web, Slack, Facebook, Twitter, and more!

Make your messages more fun and expressive—download Emoji & GIF Finder today! 🎉✨

Keywords:
Emoji search, GIF finder, GIF search, emoji keyboard, GIF integration, Gmail GIFs, Slack emojis, WhatsApp emojis, emoji extension, trending GIFs, Chrome emoji tool, emoji GIF extension.
